text: Marjorie Taylor Greene (born May 27, 1974) also known by her initials MTG, is an American politician, businesswoman and far-right conspiracy theorist.Sources describing Greene as a "conspiracy theorist" include: * * * * * * * * * * * * Since 2021, she has been serving as the United States representative for Georgia's 14th congressional district. Green is a member of the Republican Party. Greene is a strong supporter of President Donald Trump. She supports his Make America Great Again and America First movements. Greene supported Trump's attempts to overturn the 2020 presidential election and has supported his false claims of a stolen election. She called for the results of the 2020 presidential election in Georgia to not be certified. Greene was also part of a group of Republican officials who challenged the results for 2021 Electoral College vote count and found no evidence of election or voter fraud. == References == Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Georgia Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene
